original_text: That is why I came out to meet you. I was looking for you, and now I have found you!
korean_text: 이러므로 내가 너를 맞으려고 나와 네 얼굴을 찾다가 너를 만났도다

sentences.original_text: That is why I came out to meet you
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 내가 나와서 당신을 만나러 온 것입니다

sentences.original_text: and now I have found you
